mapper.update: update inventory set create_date = #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commodity_num_id = #{commodity_num_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_num = #{inventory_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commodity_num = #{commodity_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, profit_status = #{profit_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_employee_code = #{inventory_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_employee_name = #{inventory_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_carry_over_id = #{inventory_carry_over_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_adjust_status = #{inventory_adjust_status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where inventory_id = #{inventory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select inventory_id, create_date, commodity_num_id, inventory_num, commodity_num, profit_status, inventory_employee_code, inventory_employee_name, inventory_carry_over_id, inventory_adjust_status from inventory where inventory_id = #{inventory_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select inventory_id, create_date, commodity_num_id, inventory_num, commodity_num, profit_status, inventory_employee_code, inventory_employee_name, inventory_carry_over_id, inventory_adjust_status from inventory
